org.jamsim.matrix

Class MatrixUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamsim.matrix.MatrixUtil

  • public class MatrixUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Matrix utility functions. Contains methods for manipulating matrices.

    Uses the COLT libraries.

    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MatrixUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DoubleMatrix2D[] createAdjustedMatrixArray(DoubleMatrix2D mToAdjust, DoubleMatrix2D mAdjustBy)
      For each row in mToAdjust, multiply mToAdjust by this row and save the result to an array of matrices.
      static DoubleMatrix2D mult(DoubleMatrix2D m2, DoubleMatrix1D m1)
      Multiply each row in a 2D matrix by a 1D matrix

    • Constructor Detail

      • MatrixUtil

        public MatrixUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • mult

        public static DoubleMatrix2D mult(DoubleMatrix2D m2,
                  DoubleMatrix1D m1)
        Multiply each row in a 2D matrix by a 1D matrix
        Parameters:
        m2 - Source 2D matrix
        m1 - 1D matrix to multiple each row of m2 by
        Returns:
        A new 2D matrix, with the same dynamic type as m2, with each column of each row multiplied by the corresponding column in m1

      • createAdjustedMatrixArray

        public static DoubleMatrix2D[] createAdjustedMatrixArray(DoubleMatrix2D mToAdjust,
                                         DoubleMatrix2D mAdjustBy)
        For each row in mToAdjust, multiply mToAdjust by this row and save the result to an array of matrices.
        Parameters:
        mToAdjust - matrix to be adjusted
        mAdjustBy - matrix used to adjust mToAdjust
        Returns:
        DoubleMatrix2D[] array of adjusted matrices
